name: Chronobreak
description:
Post your score in the comments! Lets see who gets the highest! :D

Chronobreak is an action packed highscore based, ass kicking, combo racking, cyborg cutting, time traveling, play making platformer, all about styling on your enemies and managing risk.

You play as will smith, fighting cyborgs with mind controlled shurikens, with his special ability- "rewind time" 

Controls:

Move: W A S D

Throw shuriken: Left click

Charge rewind: Shift

Your shurikens function both as your damage and your defense. when you throw them, they return to you after 5 seconds

When they are sorrounding you they work as a shield, so if you get hit, one of the shurikens break instead of you dying. 

Rewind retracts all shurikens.

If you get hit with no shurikens left, or while having thrown them all, you die, and your score isn't recorded.

You claim your score by letting the timer in the bottom right corner run out.

Celebrity endorsements:

5/5 "Ahh that's hot" - Will Smith

1/5 "I don't know whats going on" - Our mom who doesn't play videogames
